mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DEBIT(CARDNUM, CORP, NAME, NICKNAME, ENTRY, VALDATE) VALUES(#{cardNum}, #{corp}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{entry} , #{valDate})
INSERT INTO COSTLIST (REGITRECEIPTDATE, USEDATE, USEAT, COST, DETAIL, COSTCODE, CARDNUM, MAIL) VALUES(#{regitReceiptDate}, #{useDate},#{useAt}, #{cost}, #{detail}, #{costCode}, #{cardNum}, #{mail})
mapper.update: update debit set cardnum=#{cardNum}, corp=#{corp}, name=#{name}, nickname=#{nickName}, entry=#{entry}, valdate=#{valDate} where cardnum=#{cardNum}
mapper.select: SELECT USEDATE, COST, COSTLIST.COSTCODE, COSTCODE.ENTRY FROM COSTLIST JOIN COSTCODE ON COSTLIST.COSTCODE = COSTCODE.COSTCODE
SELECT SUM(COST) AS COST, COSTCODE.ENTRY FORM COSTLIST JOIN COSTCODE ON COSTLIST.COSTCODE = COSTCODE.COSTCODE WHERE USEDATE LIST CONCAT('%', #{useDate}, '%') GROUP BY COSTCODE.ENTRY;
SELECT SUM(COST) AS COST, COSTCODE,ENTRY FROM COSTLIST JOIN COSTCODE ON COSTLIST.COSTCODE = COSTCODE.COSTCODE WHERE USEDATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{useDate}, '%') GROUP BY COSTCODE.ENTRY;
SELECT USEDATE FORM COSTLIST WHERE USEDATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{yyyy}, '%');
SELECT COUNT(CARDNUM) FROM DEBIT WHERE CARDNUM = #{CARDNUM}
